tour_name: Ceylon Tea Trails & South Coast Paradise

sections.title: Ceylon Tea Trails: Immersive Luxury in the Highlands
sections.content: Immerse yourselves in the old-world charm of Ceylon Tea Trails, nestled in Sri Lanka's breathtaking UNESCO Central Highlands. You'll be staying in meticulously restored tea planter bungalows, where unparalleled butler service caters to your every need. Indulge in gourmet dining experiences, each meal a culinary masterpiece. Discover the art of tea with guided tastings, wander hand-in-hand through lush tea plantations, and enjoy leisurely games of tennis and croquet amidst the stunning scenery. As the sun sets, savor a romantic dinner featuring exquisite tea-infused cuisine, followed by intimate moments by the fireplace, creating unforgettable memories together.

sections.title: Cultural Heartbeat: Kandy's Spirituality and Galle's Historic Charm
sections.content: Embark on a cultural journey to Kandy, a city steeped in history and spirituality. Visit the sacred Temple of the Tooth, a place of reverence and wonder, where you'll witness ancient traditions. Next, venture to Galle, a UNESCO World Heritage Site, and explore the captivating historic fort city. You'll reside within the fort walls, allowing you to fully immerse yourselves in the charm and atmosphere of this remarkable place. Delight in authentic local cuisine, uncover unique treasures while shopping, and wander through the cobblestone streets, embracing the rich heritage that surrounds you.

sections.title: South Coast Paradise: Romance and Relaxation by the Indian Ocean
sections.content: Escape to the idyllic beaches of Sri Lanka's South Coast, where pure relaxation and romance await. Spend your days basking in the sun, swimming in the crystal-clear waters, or simply unwinding in your luxurious setting overlooking the mesmerizing Indian Ocean. Pamper yourselves with couples' spa treatments, designed to rejuvenate your body and soul. Enjoy intimate dining experiences, savoring the fresh flavors of the sea and local delicacies. Embark on a breathtaking sunset cruise along the coast, witnessing the sky ablaze with vibrant colors. For the adventurous, opportunities abound to explore ancient temples, embark on thrilling whale watching excursions, or simply lose yourselves in the serenity of your surroundings, creating lasting memories of your tropical paradise.
